alert.note: Alert for Central Lea County; Eddy County Plains; Northern Lea County; Southern Lea County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued February 21 at 2:02AM MST until February 22 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 40 to 50 mph with gusts up to 75 mph possible. * WHERE...Portions of southeast New Mexico and southwest and western Texas. * WHEN...From this evening through Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...High winds could make driving difficult for motorists driving high profile vehicles such as campers, vans, and tractor trailers. A few power outages are also possible.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Central Lea County; Eddy County Plains; Northern Lea County; Southern Lea County
